mission: To empower small and medium businesses with custom AI automation systems that transfer capability, not dependency — enabling service-industry SMBs to build, own, and independently operate their own AI workflows
vision: To become the leading AI capability-transfer partner for service-industry SMBs across the Americas, serving 500+ partnerships by 2028 with bilingual (English/Spanish) AI solutions that eliminate 15-35 hours of weekly administrative burden per business
business_stage: Growth-stage startup with 18 active partnerships, $12,500 MRR, and $245,000 pipeline value
target_market: Service-industry SMBs (HVAC, Plumbing, Construction, Property Management, Electrical, Landscaping) with 1-50 employees, $500K-$10M annual revenue, and high administrative overhead — with focus on bilingual Hispanic-owned businesses across the US
total_addressable_market: $8.2 billion (68% of 33.2M US SMBs now use AI, spending $10,000+ annually — ELEV8TION targets the 62% who lack understanding of where AI fits their business)
